nodes.text: Steve Dutro is a comic-book letterer. He began his career at Marvel Comics in 1991.
Besides Star Wars, Dutro's work includes titles such as Spider-Man, Fantastic Four, Superman, and various other books for Marvel, DC Comics, Image, and Dark Horse Comics.
He currently works on publications for Viz Comics, Dark Horse, Hellhounds, and a few upcoming Image Comics projects with creator George Singley.
Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron: The Rebel Opposition
Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron: The Phantom Affair
